#Text= Zhao says : " Colonel Shinu , please reconsider ... Their precision is legendary .

column1: #Text=The Yuyan can pin a fly to a tree from one hundred yards away ... without killing it .
#Text=You 're wasting their talents using them as mere security guards .
#Text=" Shinu says : " I can do whatever I want with their talents , they 're my archers , and what I say goes .
#Text=" Zhao says : " But my search for the Avatar is - " Shinu says : " Is nothing but a vanity project !
#Text=We 're fighting a real war here , and I need every man I 've got , commander .
#Text=I do n't wan na hear another word about it !
#Text=" Zhao says : " News from Fire Lord Ozai ?
#Text=" Zhao says : " It appears I 've been promoted to Admiral .
